# The scource files are uncommented for the Productionized run (Remove the `#` when troubleshooting these scripts)

#dboOJDT = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboOJDT.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboOJDT.createOrReplaceTempView("dboOJDT")

#dboJDT1 = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboJDT1.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboJDT1.createOrReplaceTempView("dboJDT1")

#dboOACT = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@citylogisticsstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/Unstructured Data/SAP/dboOACT.parquet', format='parquet')
#dboOACT.createOrReplaceTempView("dboOACT")
## Create MANUAL_JOURNAL_TMP required for the creation of MANUAL JOURNAL

MANUAL_JOURNAL_TMP = spark.sql("""
SELECT ojdt.TransId,  
     Memo as `Line_Description`, 
     LocTotal as `Doc_Total`, 
     CASE WHEN ojdt.DocType = 'I' THEN 'Item'
          WHEN ojdt.DocType = 'S' THEN 'Service'
          ELSE 'Manual'
     END AS `Document_Type`,
     "City Logistics New" as Company,
     --jdt1.TransId, 
     Line_ID as `Line_Number`, 
     Account as `System_Account_Code`, 
     Debit, 
     Credit, 
     jdt1.DueDate as `Due_Date`, 
     CAST(jdt1.RefDate as date) as `Posting_Date2`,
     SourceID, 
     SourceLine, 
     jdt1.TransType as ObjType, 
     TRIM(jdt1.Project) as Project, 
     jdt1.TransCode as TransCode, 
     jdt1.UserSign as UserSign, 
     LineMemo as `Line_Detail`,
     jdt1.Ref1 as `Journal_Item_Ref`,
     jdt1.Ref2 as `Journal_BP_Ref`,
     VatGroup as `VAT_Group`, 
     VatRate as `VAT_%`, 
     jdt1.ObjType as `ObjType_Journal`, 
     VatLine, 
     VatAmount as `VAT_Value`, 
     GrossValue, 
     LineType, 
     DebCred, 
--     "City Logistics New" as Company,
--	Adding U_DEPOT to get the Sub depot code
     U_DEPOT as SubDepotCode,
     --AcctCode as `System_Account_Code`,
     GroupMask,
      AcctName as `Account_Name`,
     Segment_0 as `Account_Code`, 
     Segment_1 as `Service_Type_Code`, 
     Segment_2 as `Depot_Code` --,
--     "City Logistics New" as Company
FROM dboOJDT ojdt
LEFT JOIN dboJDT1 jdt1
       ON ojdt.TransId = jdt1.TransId
LEFT JOIN dboOACT oact
       ON jdt1.Account = oact.AcctCode
""")
#MANUAL_JOURNAL_TMP.show()
MANUAL_JOURNAL_TMP.createOrReplaceTempView("MANUAL_JOURNAL_TMP")

MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART1 = spark.sql("""
SELECT TransId,
	 `Line_Description`,
	 `Line_Detail`,
	 `Journal_Item_Ref`,
	 `Journal_BP_Ref`,
	 `Doc_Total`,
	 `Document_Type`,
	 `Line_Number`,
	 `System_Account_Code`,
	 sum(Credit) - sum(Debit) as `Line_Total`,
	 'Expense' as `Revenue/Expense_Category`,
	 `Due_Date`,
	 `Posting_Date2`,
	 `ObjType`,
	 TRIM(Project) as Project,
	 TransCode,
	 UserSign,
	 `VAT_Group`,
	 `VAT_%`,
	 `ObjType_Journal`,
	 sum( `VAT_Value`) as `VAT_Value`,
	 sum(`GrossValue`) as `Gross_Value`,
	 Company,
	 SubDepotCode,
	 'Manual Journal' as `Document_Category`
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_TMP
where (ObjType = 30 or ObjType = -4)
and (`Account_Code` || `Service_Type_Code` || `Depot_Code` <> '572110ADHDO')
and (`Account_Code` || `Service_Type_Code` || `Depot_Code` <> '511120ADHDO')
and (`Account_Code` || `Service_Type_Code` || `Depot_Code` <> '571170ADHDO')
and (GroupMask = 5 or GroupMask = 6 or GroupMask = 7 or GroupMask = 8)
group by TransId,
	 `Line_Description`,
	 `Line_Detail`,
	 `Journal_Item_Ref`,
	 `Journal_BP_Ref`,
	 `Doc_Total`,
	 `Document_Type`,
	 `Line_Number`,
	 `System_Account_Code`,
	 `Due_Date`,
	 `Posting_Date2`,
	 `ObjType`,
	 Project,
	 TransCode,
	 UserSign,
	 `VAT_Group`,
	 `VAT_%`,
	 `ObjType_Journal`,
	 Company,
	 SubDepotCode
""")
#MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART1.show()
MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART1.createOrReplaceTempView("MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART1")


MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART2 = spark.sql("""

and GroupMask = 4

Manual_Journal = spark.sql("""
SELECT DISTINCT *
FROM(
SELECT *
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART1
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART2
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART3
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART4
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART5
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_PART6
)a
""")
#Manual_Journal.show()
Manual_Journal.createOrReplaceTempView("Manual_Journal")

GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART1 = spark.sql("""
SELECT TransId,
	 `Line_Description`,
	 `Line_Detail`,
	 `Journal_Item_Ref`,
	 `Journal_BP_Ref`,
	 `Doc_Total`,
	 `Document_Type`,
	 `Line_Number`,
	 `System_Account_Code`,
	 sum(Debit) - sum(Credit) as `Line_Total`,
	 'Assets' as `Revenue/Expense_Category`,
	 `Due_Date`,
	 `Posting_Date2`,
	 `ObjType`,
	 TRIM(Project) as Project,
	 TransCode,
	 UserSign,
	 `VAT_Group`,
	 `VAT_%`,
	 `ObjType_Journal`,
	 sum( `VAT_Value`) as `VAT_Value`,
	 sum(`GrossValue`) as `Gross_Value`,
	 Company,
	 SubDepotCode,
	 'Journal' as `Document_Category`
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_TMP
where GroupMask = 1
group by TransId,
	 `Line_Description`,

	 Project,

""")

GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART6 = spark.sql("""
SELECT TransId,
	 `Line_Description`,
	 `Line_Detail`,
	 `Journal_Item_Ref`,
	 `Journal_BP_Ref`,
	 `Doc_Total`,
	 `Document_Type`,
	 `Line_Number`,
	 `System_Account_Code`,
	 sum(Debit) - sum(Credit) as `Line_Total`,
	 'Operating Costs' as `Revenue/Expense_Category`,
	 `Due_Date`,
	 `Posting_Date2`,
	 `ObjType`,
	 TRIM(Project, ' ') as Project,
	 TransCode,
	 UserSign,
	 `VAT_Group`,
	 `VAT_%`,
	 `ObjType_Journal`,
	 sum( `VAT_Value`) as `VAT_Value`,
	 sum(`GrossValue`) as `Gross_Value`,
	 Company,
	 SubDepotCode,
	 'Journal' as `Document_Category`
FROM MANUAL_JOURNAL_TMP
where GroupMask = 6
and TransId NOT IN (311478,311479,311480,311481,311482,311484,311485)
group by TransId,
	 `Line_Description`,
	 `Line_Detail`,
	 `Journal_Item_Ref`,
	 `Journal_BP_Ref`,
	 `Doc_Total`,
	 `Document_Type`,
	 `Line_Number`,
	 `System_Account_Code`,
	 `Due_Date`,
	 `Posting_Date2`,
	 `ObjType`,
	 Project,
	 TransCode,
	 UserSign,
	 `VAT_Group`,
	 `VAT_%`,
	 `ObjType_Journal`,
	 Company,
	 SubDepotCode
""")
GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART6.createOrReplaceTempView("GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART6")

GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART7 = spark.sql("""
SELECT TransId,
	 `Line_Description`,
	 `Line_Detail`,
	 `Journal_Item_Ref`,
	 `Journal_BP_Ref`,
	 `Doc_Total`,
	 `Document_Type`,

""")

GENERAL_Journal = spark.sql("""
SELECT DISTINCT *
FROM(
SELECT *
FROM GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART1
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART2
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART3
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART4
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART5
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART6
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART7
)a
""")
#GENERAL_Journal.show()
GENERAL_Journal.createOrReplaceTempView("GENERAL_Journal")

%%sql

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT TransId), COUNT(TransId)
FROM GENERAL_JOURNAL_PART7
WHERE Posting_Date2 BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
